text: can you DM a link to projects deploy that was unsuccesful

I'm trying to create a paged data table and wondering what's the best way to notify server-side components of the URL query change without reloading the page? I'm using `withUrlAndQuery` and on the client I'm using `usePageURL()` and `pushHistoryState` but the page change isn't picked up by the `withUrlAndQuery` component, only if I reload the page.

Could not find it, but would it be possible to add translations to global modules build with React CMS??

Edit: Never mind! Found out you can add variations within the global editor in HS
